title: 08/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/16/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin analyzes all of the rookie quarterbacks who made their debuts in the NFL preseason and why they all look to be exactly as advertised. He points out that one of the rookies that looks to have the best physical traits still needs time to grow before being named the starter. He explains why he was right about Tom Brady and wrong about Team USA winning the gold medal at the Olympics. Plus, 5-time Pro Bowler Tony Boselli joins the show to tell Colin if Urban Meyer can rebuild the Jaguars after having so much success in college.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
